style.main: margin-left: 240px, width: calc(100% - 240px), display: flex, flex-direction: column, padding: 0 32px
style.root-header: height: 112px, display: flex, flex-direction: column, justify-content: center, row-gap: 4px
style.heading: font-size: 26px, font-weight: 700, color: var(--light-black)
style.details-header: height: 64px, display: flex, flex-direction: column, justify-content: center

notes: Modifying margin and width for 'main' class might not be needed depending on Sidenav implementation
